ba.com.zira.praksa.core.validation

Class GameRequestValidation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ba.com.zira.praksa.core.validation.GameRequestValidation

  • @Component(value="gameRequestValidation")
public class GameRequestValidation
extends Object
    SampleRequestValidation is used for validation of GameService requests.
    e.g. database validation needed
    Author:
    zira
